channel.title: Do sth. Slowly
channel.description: Recent content on Do sth. Slowly

item.title: LCP 3. 机器人大冒险
item.description: 这道题目考察对循环节的理解。 #include <vector> #include <iostream> #include <cmath> using namespace std; class Solution { public: int deltax, deltay; bool robot(string command, vector<vector<int>>& obstacles, int x, int y) { deltax = 0, deltay = 0; for (auto i: command) if (i == 'U') deltay++; else deltax++; for (auto i: obstacles) { if (i[0] > x || i[1] > y) continue; if (check(command, i[0], i[1], i[0], i[1])) return false; } return check(command, x, y, x, y); } bool check(string cmd, int x, int y, int X, int Y) { int N, startx, starty, N1; if (cmd[0] == 'U') { N = ceil(1.

item.title: Something About Emacs
item.description: In this series, I will write something about Emacs. motion commands of c-mode Keystokes Command name Action C-M-a beginning-of-defun Move to the beginning of the body of the function C-M-e end-of-defun Move to the end of the function C-M-h c-mark-function Put the cursor at the beginning of the function, the mark at the end C-c C-q c-indent-defun Indent the entire function according to indention style

item.title: start a new blog
item.description: generate ssh-keygen For more information, please refer to this. λ ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "thanks_music163@163.com" Add public key to github Add ssh configuration Host github-thanks_music HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_thanks_music install Emacs package ox-hugo M-x list-packages or use-package: (use-package ox-hugo :ensure t :after ox) Refer to document ox-hugo. install hugo on macOS: brew update; and brew install hugo Read the document about Hugo.
